name: Zurik 23M
profile:
From Russia with love. My name is Zurab (or Zurik, as you please) and I'm a Video Editor. 
I make fan-videos on tv shows/anime/movies and I hope that you will enjoy being here.

I don't monetize my videos. All profits from the videos go to the copyright holders.
The videos are made exclusively for creative purposes. I do not claim ownership of the content used on my channel.
